import React, { useContext, useRef, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Swal from "sweetalert2/dist/sweetalert2.js"; import "sweetalert2/src/sweetalert2.scss"; import "../../../Scss/FifaChart.scss"; function useEffectSkipFirst(fn, arr) { const isFirst = useRef(true); useEffect(() => { if (isFirst.current) { isFirst.current = false; return; } fn(); }, arr); } const FifaResult = () => { return (
